text: Tony Hawk's American Sk8land is a skateboarding video game. It was published by Activision and was developed by Vicarious Visions. The game was released alongside Tony Hawk's American Wasteland. It was released on October 18, 2005 for the Gameboy Advance and on November 15, 2005 for the Nintendo DS. The game is in a cel shading style. In the game, the player creates a skater and wins a skateboarding competition. After winning, they are congratulated by Tony Hawk. Hawk tells them about the skating scene in California and takes them to Los Angeles. Hawk and the player meet a comic book writer named Mindy and they try and save a skatepark that Hawk grew up with called American Sk8land before it's torn down. ==Reception== The game was given positive reviews by game critics. Critics said that the graphics, custom sound effects feature, game's design and framerate. ==References== Category:2005 video games Category:Tony Hawk video games Category:Activision video games Category:Vicarious Visions games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:Single-player video games Category:Skateboarding video games Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Tony Hawk's American Sk8land
